import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Layout, Row, Col, Table } from 'antd'; import '../assets/css/portofolio.css' import Navbar from '../common/layout/navbar-landing' import ButtonHome from '../common/component/button/button-home'; const { Content } = Layout; // membuat konstanta content const whyData = [{ title: 'Name', dataIndex: 'name', key: 'name', render: text => {text}, }, { title: 'Age', dataIndex: 'age', key: 'age', }, { title: 'Address', dataIndex: 'address', key: 'address', }, { title: 'Action', key: 'action', render: (text, record) => ( Action ä¸€ {record.name} Delete More actions ), }]; class KmsComponent extends Component{ render(){ const { initialData, data, columns } = this.props; return(
Data KMS Anak
Platform pengisian data KMS oleh Admin Posyandu.
{ whyData.map( data =>
{data.title}
{data.description}

) }

columns={columns} dataSource={data} className="table-active-event"
); } } export default KmsComponent;
